name: Aggregates

runs.name: Simple access
runs.description: Get price of the song named 'Call Me Today' by John Doe

runs.name: Aggregates
runs.description: Get price of the album Unnamed by John Doe (sums all songs in the album)

solutionSQL:
SELECT * FROM music 
UNION ALL
SELECT artist, '#'+album as song, sum(price) as price FROM music
GROUP BY artist, album
